name: Trentonaza
short_description: The first tool that you have for weight loss is going to be getting a good food diary. It might be a published health diary that will allow you to write in different things like calorie counts and other measurements, or you might simply choose to use a notebook to write down what you eat. Remember that you should write down everything that you consume. Make sure that you have a spot to write down what your weight is that day, while remember to weigh yourself at roughly the same time every day. This can be an instrumental part of the way that you move forward and you can be sure that it can tell you a lot about what direction you want to move in.
